metadata.description: Vendor-published Medicare coverage information for OpenOnco tests
metadata.sources: Vendor websites, press releases, billing pages

Signatera.lcdName: MolDX: Molecular Residual Disease Testing for Cancer

Signatera Genome.lcdName: MolDX: Molecular Residual Disease Testing for Cancer

coveredIndications: Recurrent, relapsed, refractory, metastatic, or advanced non-CNS solid tumors
Metastatic/inoperable solid tumors on immune checkpoint inhibitors

Shield.notes: First FDA-approved blood test for CRC screening. ADLT status April 2025.

Shield MCD.notes: Multi-cancer detection - coverage TBD pending FDA approval

FoundationOne CDx.reimbursement: 97% of Medicare patients have $0 financial responsibility
FoundationOne CDx.notes: First FDA-approved CGP meeting NCD 90.2 requirements

coveredIndications: Advanced solid tumors when tissue insufficient

FoundationOne Tracker (MRD).notes: Partnership with Natera - uses Signatera platform

Galleri.notes: NOT covered by Medicare. REACH study (IDE) provides coverage for 50,000 study participants only. Pending FDA approval and congressional action (H.R. 2407, S. 2085).

Cologuard Plus.notes: Need to verify coverage - different from original Cologuard

Oncodetect.notes: MRD test - likely covered under L38779

OncoExTra.notes: CGP test - likely covered under NCD 90.2

coveredIndications: HR+, HER2-, node-negative early breast cancer

Tempus xT CDx.notes: FDA PMA approved May 2023. CMS added to NCD 90.2 coverage Nov 2023 (transmittal 13278). 648-gene panel.

Tempus xT.notes: LDT version. Medicare coverage announced Nov 2023 via MolDX/Palmetto GBA.

Tempus xF.notes: Liquid biopsy panel - likely covered under plasma genomic profiling LCD

MI Cancer Seek.notes: FDA PMA approved Nov 2024. First WES/WTS CDx. PLA code 0211U.

coveredIndications: Includes MI Cancer Seek + IHC + additional markers
MI Profile.notes: Full molecular profiling package. Uses MI Cancer Seek for NGS component if specimen qualifies, otherwise MI Tumor Seek Hybrid (LDT).

MI Tumor Seek Hybrid.notes: WES/WTS LDT - used when specimen doesn't meet MI Cancer Seek FDA CDx requirements

Caris Assure.notes: Liquid biopsy for treatment decision support. MolDX pricing per Caris IPO filing.

clonoSEQ.lcdName: MolDX: Minimal Residual Disease Testing for Cancer
clonoSEQ.fdaStatus: FDA De Novo cleared (first MRD IVD)
coveredIndications: B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia (B-ALL) - bone marrow
Chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL) - blood or bone marrow
MCL surveillance - single timepoint every 6 months for 5 years (April 2025)
clonoSEQ.reimbursement: Episode payment structure for series of tests
clonoSEQ.notes: First and only FDA-cleared MRD assay. Over 240 million covered lives. Coverage via MolDX LCD finalized Nov 2021.

pressReleases.title: Initial Medicare coverage for MM and ALL

RaDaR.lcdName: MolDX: Minimal Residual Disease Testing for Cancer
coveredIndications: HR+/HER2- breast cancer (stage II/III, 5+ years post-diagnosis, NED)
RaDaR.notes: MolDX coverage announced July 2023, effective March 24, 2023. Tumor-informed, tracks up to 48 variants. LOD 0.001%. Coverage currently breast cancer only - CRC coverage in development.

pressReleases.title: Medicare coverage for HR+/HER2- breast cancer MRD

InVisionFirst-Lung.notes: Liquid biopsy for NSCLC therapy selection. Built on InVision platform.

NeXT Dx.lcdName: MolDX: Next-Generation Sequencing for Solid Tumors
NeXT Dx.notes: Medicare coverage announced Oct 2024, effective Aug 29, 2023. Whole exome + transcriptome with tumor/normal paired analysis.

pressReleases.title: Medicare coverage for NeXT Dx comprehensive profiling

NeXT Personal Dx.lcdName: MolDX: Minimal Residual Disease Testing for Cancer
coveredIndications: Stage II and III breast cancer (HR+/HER2-, HER2+, TNBC)
NeXT Personal Dx.notes: Medicare coverage announced Nov 2025, effective Oct 7, 2025. Ultrasensitive WGS-based MRD. Updated reimbursement rates effective Dec 1, 2025. Marketed through Tempus AI partnership.

pressReleases.title: Medicare coverage for breast cancer MRD surveillance

Northstar Select.notes: Medicare coverage announced April 2025, effective Feb 14, 2025. 84-gene liquid biopsy panel with QCT technology. Head-to-head study showed 51% more actionable alterations vs competitors. LOD 0.15% VAF.

coveredIndications: Treatment response monitoring in advanced cancers
Northstar Response.notes: NOT YET COVERED. Methylation-based tissue-free TRM test. Company targeting Medicare coverage before end of 2026 per Q3 2025 earnings call.

MSK-IMPACT.fdaStatus: FDA De Novo Class II authorized (November 2017)
coveredIndications: Detection of somatic mutations (point mutations, small indels)
MSK-IMPACT.coverageNotes: FDA authorized but NOT a companion diagnostic - covered under NCD 90.2 Section D as lab-developed test. First NGS tumor profiling test to receive FDA authorization through de novo pathway. MSK pursuing CDx status for specific biomarkers to achieve Section A/B coverage.
MSK-IMPACT.notes: 468-gene panel, tissue-based (FFPE), includes tumor/normal paired analysis. Available only at MSK. Used for clinical trial enrollment matching. MSK-IMPACT Heme also available for hematologic malignancies.

coveredIndications: Liquid biopsy CGP for solid tumors
MSK-ACCESS.notes: MSK's liquid biopsy companion to MSK-IMPACT. 129-gene ctDNA panel. Coverage via MolDX plasma genomic profiling LCD.

Invitae PCM (cfDNA MRD).lcdName: MolDX: Minimal Residual Disease Testing for Cancer
Invitae PCM (cfDNA MRD).notes: Labcorp acquired Invitae's oncology business. Personalized cancer monitoring via cfDNA. Tumor-informed approach.

Haystack MRD.lcdName: MolDX: Minimal Residual Disease Testing for Cancer
Haystack MRD.notes: Tumor-informed WGS-derived panel (~50 variants). LOD 6 ppm. Submitted for MolDX coverage. Coverage status: Pending formal announcement but expected covered under L38779.

StrataNGS.notes: Liquid biopsy CGP panel. 55 genes for therapy selection. Coverage via MolDX plasma genomic profiling LCD.

L38779.name: MolDX: Molecular Residual Disease Testing for Cancer

L38121.name: MolDX: Next-Generation Sequencing for Solid Tumors
L38121.mac: Noridian J-F (AK, ID, OR, WA, UT, AZ, MT, ND, SD, WY)
